page.title: 19ST.NICHOLAS COMBINED SCHOOL.
page.content: ST. NICHOLAS' CE COMBINED SCHOOL. The school is the largest of its kind in Warwickshire with 470 pupils aged between 5 and 12 on roll. It is a "combined" First and Middle school, hence its title. It is housed in spacious buildings on Priory Road and is very well resourced having laboratories for Maths, Science, Computer Studies; Craft/Design and Art Studios, a Music Studio; 2 Libraries; a Unit for Partially-hearing pupils; a Gymnasium and Hall as well as large Sports fields, an Ecology area and an Adventure Playground. There are at present 21 teachers and 30 Ancillary staff. The school was one of the 17 schools which took part in the preparation and trialling of the "DOMESDAY PROJECT" materials in 1984 prior to the project being lauched nationally in 1985.
